info.description:
Subtitles says it all, really. You're a human or humanoid, and you're gonna have sex and/or get vore'd by monsters of all kinds, whether they be werid Lovecratifan horrors, More beastial ones like trolls, pretty much anything not (completely) human. Original, fan characters, all are fine by me.

Gay or straight stuff is fine.

All kinds of vore are OK (or no vore at all, if that's what you choose to do). I'm not personally a fan of scat or watersports or farting stuff, so if you do add that in, mark it as such.

Lastly; please make sure the chapters you ass aren't of a decent length (no one-liners), and are free of spelling or grammar errors (No chatspeak or the like. Also: remember your there/their/they'res: "the guys took their stuff over there, since they're the types who like doing that.")
